title: Launch several Quarkus modules of a multi maven module project in dev mode at the same time
body:
### Description

I am currently migrating a multi maven module project based on wildfly to Quarkus. There is one thing (according to me) that was better with wildfly and that could be improve on Quarkus.

My maven multi modules project is composed of 6 modules.

```
myproject
    module1 -> configuration module with application.properties (shared with other modules)
    module2 -> java module1 (not a quarkus module)
    module3 -> java module2 (not a quarkus module)
    module4 -> Quarkus module 1 ( use modules 1 and 2)
    module5 -> Quarkus module 2 ( use modules 1 and 2)
```

With wildfly, in eclipse I was able with the server view to start at the same time the modules 4 and 5 of my project. Now with quarkus I have to launch the module4 and then the module5.

It would be very nice to be able to launch the dev mode on the root project (myproject in my example) at then module4 and module5 will be automatically started in dev mode.

In reality I have 8 quarkus modules so it's a bit annoying to have 8 consoles and check the logs in the 8 consoles instead of one.

(I am using Quarkus3.0.0.Alpha4)
